description: Pantys is an omni-channel DNVB that is transforming feminine care to deliver best-in-class innovations in women’s health and sustainability.
Papadimitriou is a family-owned commodity export business of all-natural balsamic vinegars and mustards in unique Mediterranean flavors, all derived from currants.
Parclick offers consumers online parking reservations in Europe. It provides guaranteed reservations of parking spaces in covered and guarded public car parks at discounted prices.

Pargo is a South African smart logistics company that connects consumers, companies, and couriers nationwide, allowing them to send and receive parcels through a tech enabled network of Pargo pick-up points located at convenient retail stores.

Parkimovil allows for the efficient control of parking lots, generating mobility solutions in overpopulated areas throughout Mexico. It is an app-based system that provides virtual parking and access control, and enables interactions and payments.
Passei Direto is Brazil’s largest study platform that allows students to access millions of study materials on a freemium subscription model. The company sold to UOL Edtech in 2021.
Patagonia Biotecnología (“PatBio”) uses abundant seaweed to produce bio-stimulants that enhance growth and increase yields and caliber of a wide range of agricultural products.
PayTabs is an online payment gateway operating in the MENA and Asia-Pacific regions.

PedidosYa connects consumers with restaurants and groceries stores for easy and quick delivery and take-away via online ordering, phone and interactive TV. Pedidos Ya was acquired by Delivery Hero in 2014.
Pharma M is a pharmaceutical manufacturing company specializing in the production and marketing of clinically proven dietary supplements.
Photobook Worldwide is an e-commerce business that provides a unique experience in preserving meaningful memories through a fully customizable, premium printed photo album.
Picus Security is a cybersecurity platform operating in the Breach & Attack Simulation (BAS) subsector of cyber tools.

Pier is a Brazilian insurtech platform that provides smartphone and automobile coverage to its 100k+ customers. Founded in 2018, the company offers smartphone and automobile insurance products and is the first and only insurtech in the country to operate under the Oficial Brazilian Regulator permanent national insurance license.
Pincho Factory’s Latin-inspired burgers and “pincho” -the Spanish word for a kebab- offer a fast-casual dining experience as diversely American as the city that calls it home.

Pipefy optimizes business processes one workflow at a time, empowering every “doer” to organize and control their work in a single place, streamline and automate any process, and integrate with legacy tools without a single line of code.
Pisamonas is a Spanish kids’ footwear brand that combines great design and affordable prices.
Pitzi offers customers a phone protection plan against accidents and/or theft that guarantees a phone back in less than 5 days, or a new one if Pitzi can’t repair the damages.

Planet Farms built and operates the largest vertical farm in Europe, on the outskirts of Milan, producing and packaging basil and lettuce sold in 350+ supermarket chains and online retailers across Italy.
Platinum Heritage is a tourism company, showcasing the true roots of Emirati and Bedouin cultures.

Plaza Logística enables large retail, e-commerce and other businesses to create synergies across their logistics operations, from warehouse loading and unloading to security systems, helping them reduce costs.
